All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
achieve
The achieve class is an abstract class that provides methods to manage achievements.
Activity_detail
Represents the main activity detail window of the Moral Score System.
calMoral
Represents the Moral Calculation window of the Moral Score System.
club
Represents a club in the Moral Score System.
club_detail
Represents the club details user interface for the Moral Score System.
clubDialog
Represents a dialog for entering and editing club role information.
clubManager
Manages the operations and persistence of club objects.
Course
The Course class represents a course taken by a student.
CourseDialog
CourseDialog is a custom dialog that allows users to view and edit course information.
CourseManager
CourseManager is responsible for managing courses, including adding, updating, and saving course information.
detail
The detail interface represents the operations related to details or information.
Dialog
The Dialog interface represents a dialog component.
GUI_1
This class represents a graphical user interface (GUI) for a Learning System login.
ImageScroll
The ImageScroll class represents a JFrame that displays an image with a scrollable panel.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the CourseMark application.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
manager
The abstract class manager provides the basic functionality for adding and updating courses.
modify_GUI
The modify_GUI class represents a graphical user interface for modifying skills.
page2
The page2 class represents the second page of the GUI application.
plan_Detail
The plan_Detail class represents a JFrame that displays a to-do list table.
ScheduleGUI
The ScheduleGUI class represents a graphical user interface (GUI) for displaying a course schedule.
ScheduleReader
The ScheduleReader class provides a static method to read a course schedule from a file.
Skill_GUI
The Skill_GUI class represents a graphical user interface (GUI) for managing skills.
std_Achieve
The std_Achieve class extends the achieve class and provides methods to manage achievements for users.
StdAchieveGUI
The StdAchieveGUI class represents a graphical user interface for interacting with the std_Achieve class.
Volunteer
The Volunteer class represents a volunteer activity.
volunteer_detail
The volunteer_detail class represents the graphical user interface for managing volunteer activities.
volunteerDialog
The volunteerDialog class represents a dialog for entering and editing volunteer work information.
volunteerManager
The volunteerManager class manages the collection of Volunteer objects.
write_GUI
The write_GUI class represents a graphical user interface (GUI) for writing skills.
